price: Ceux-là, leur rétribution sera qu’ils auront sur eux la malédiction d’Allah, des Anges et de tous les êtres humains.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ جَزَآؤُهُمۡ أَنَّ عَلَيۡهِمۡ لَعۡنَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ulāika jazāuhum anna ʿalayhim laʿnata al-lahi wal-malāikati wal-nāsi ajmaʿīna
